headline: Two cities stopped adding fluoride to water. Science reveals what happened
context: Calgary, Canada, and Juneau, Alaska, show how ending fluoridation can affect health

annotations.paragraph: In cities that have stopped adding fluoride to drinking water, children experience more tooth decay, studies have shown.
annotations.reason: This paragraph provides relevant information about the impact of stopping fluoridation on children's dental health.
